item.title: General Support for a Chinese Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Hey all! I am helping a content creator, @DavidZ_Chinese, hire for another team member. David is a content creator dedicated to fostering a vibrant community passionate about learning Chinese. Operating across Instagram and TikTok, we have recently launched a language learning community aimed at making Chinese accessible and engaging. We're looking for a dynamic, creative, and proactive individual to join our team and help us expand our educational impact while maintaining a welcoming and supportive community environment.

Role Description:

We are seeking a multifaceted assistant who will contribute across three critical areas:

1. Educational Support and Content Development:
- Assist in the planning and development of educational content, including lesson plans and materials tailored for our language learning community.
- Conduct live classes, and engage with learners by responding to discussion threads, questions, and direct messages.
- Help maintain a supportive atmosphere that encourages active participation and learning.

2. Video Editing:
- Provide ad hoc support in video editing, including adding Chinese captions to our short-form content. While this task is currently managed internally, occasional assistance will be required to maintain content flow.

3. Marketing and Outreach:
- Assist in the outreach to potential sponsors and partners, including brainstorming and research.
- Support in the execution of outreach strategies to enhance the visibility and influence of our social media channels.
Ideal

Candidate Skills and Qualifications:
- Qualifications in Chinese Language, Marketing, Communications, or a related field is preferred
- Language Skills: Fluency in Chinese (Mandarin) and English is essential.
- Ability to create educational content in both languages.
- Technical Skills: Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Capcut).
- Experience with social media management tools is a plus.
- Interpersonal Skills: Must have excellent communication skills, a friendly demeanor, and enjoy interacting with a diverse audience.
- The ability to foster engagement and community spirit is crucial.
- Marketing Acumen: Experience with digital marketing, especially in social media contexts. An understanding of influencer partnerships and sponsor relations is highly advantageous.
- Self-Starter: Ability to work independently and as part of a team, demonstrating initiative and problem-solving skills.

Additional Information:
This is a remote, part-time position (~10 hours per week) offering flexible hours.
Candidates should be prepared to provide examples of prior work, especially in content creation and video editing.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00

Skills: Native Fluency, Chinese, Video Editing, Social Media Content Creation, Translation, Tutoring, Teaching

item.title: Dental Video Creation using After Effects - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video creator who can transform dental photos into captivating videos using After Effects. The videos will be used for educational and promotional purposes. As a video creator, you will be responsible for bringing life to the static images by adding animations, transitions, and effects. The final videos should be visually appealing, informative, and engaging.


Skills required:
- Proficiency in After Effects
- Strong understanding of dental concepts and terminology
- Attention to detail
- Ability to work within given timelines

This is a medium-sized project that can be completed in 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level video creator who has experience working on similar projects in the dental or medical field. If you have a portfolio showcasing your previous work, please share it with us. We are excited to collaborate with a talented professional who can bring our dental photos to life through creative video editing.

Budget: $200
